column4: After installing openbox, and changing the theme with "obconf", nothing is happening! how do I apply these settings?
I've changed the window theme, nothing changed...
are you using ONLY openbox or gnome with openbox?
ok, how do I change the openbox desktop background? is there a taskbar application? or somethhing similar?
you can use a program like nitrogen or feh to change the wallpaper. there is no taskbar application by default either.
is there a third party taskbar app i can install?
where can I find a list of common/popular openbox apps to use?
dunno. lxpanel, gnome-panel, tint2 are some popular ones
gnome-panel is docking my openbox windows... :P
i misread what you said, i thought you were asking for panels. there are no "openbox apps" - you can use any apps
no worries. Gnome-panel is great. But how do I make it dock the windows? they are minimizing to 'nowhere' hehehe
do you have the applet added for windows  being docked to it?
weird. I ran it from terminal, nothing happened. ran it from gnome-do, and now its fine :p
